name: Solar Bowl
description:
Hello survivor this is your survival guide to the desert hellscape that is Solar Bowl

First, you must go out and collect resources especially if you want to assemble a power cell for your shelter.

You're not the only one out there thought, there are other survivors who would kill you for a plate of steel in a heartbeat.

Once you have at least two of each of the items all you got to do is head back to your shelter and put them in your fabricator then it will do all the work. If you collect enough resources your fabricator might even be able to hook you up with some upgrades.

Make sure you get back to your shelter before day time your suit can handle only so much and the only way you're surviving is if you're in a powered shelter.

Well, that's all survivor good luck out there in the desert wastes.

. . .

. . .

. . .

There was no hope of survival...

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact

Left Click: Shoot
